Title: Charles-Hubert Paris 3575-W Mechanical Pocket Watch
Description: Charles-Hubert, Paris 3575-W Mechanical Pocket Watch Features: Chrome finish brass 47mm double hunter case with a matching curb chainSkeleton dial with roman numerals17 jewel mechanical movementDeluxe gift box Product Details: Product Dimensions: 5.9 x 5.9 x 5.9 inchesShipping Weight: 8 ouncesItem model number: 3575-WDomestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S. International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More Description Mechanical movement, Dress pocket watch, Black hands & Roman numerals, Small black markers surround outer dial, Skeleton dial and flip open caseback, Push down crown to open Complete with double-sided, engravable cover and skeleton dial, the Charles-Hubert, Paris Mechanical Pocket Watch 3575-W is an heirloom-quality timepiece with a contemporary edge. A chrome finish brass case and matching curb chain look classic and elegant next to the crisp white outer dial, showcasing black-tone Roman numeral hour markers. A mineral glass crystal provides resistance against wear and tear, while 17-jewel mechanical movement ensures reliability and precision.
